title: A great affordable place to eat at lunchtime
text: My father and I have eaten at Sushimania Whetstone several times and we are always happy with the food. We always go for lunch because they have 50% off. I usually order about 30 pieces of sushi with crab, prawns, chicken, duck, eel and mushroom and I'm never disappointed. My father usually gets noodles with mixed vegetables or meat. We never have to wait long for the food to arrive and it's always fresh and tasty. The service is always fantastic! My father and I will definitely visit it again when we return to London!

title: A friendly hotel near Luton airport
text: The Thistle Express is in Luton and a cab ride from the airport costs about 14 GBP. The reception was very welcoming and the people were very friendly. My room was very clean and had everything to make my stay there enjoyable. Finally, the hotel is next to a mall and many other shops in Luton. I highly recommend it!

title: A clean place to stay in the heart of London
text: The hostel is situated right in the heart of London and near the underground. The staff at reception were extremely friendly and answered all my questions. They showed me to my room which had its own bathroom and was clean. If you need a clean place to stay that's central and affordable then I highly recommend the hostel!

title: A must see attraction
text: The Acropolis is a must see attraction in Athens. It's a wonderful historic site with the Parthenon at its centre!

title: A wonderful bar
text: I went to this bar for karaoke and I was really glad I did. The atmosphere was wonderful and the bartenders were gracious. The karaoke host Heather made the atmosphere even better and was excellent at rotating the karaoke singers. I will definitely visit the bar again when I return to Phoenix!!

title: A wonderful resort
text: The SCR is a resort on Camelback Rd in Scottsdale but it's near the Scottsdale/Phoenix border and as such it's easy to get to Phoenix! The resort has a pool, squash courts, spa, gym and a lot more. For this whk don't have a car the resort is next to a bus stop.

title: A nice clean little hotel
text: The Mansion hotel is near Omonoia and the staff were very friendly and accommodating. All of our needs were met and the room was cleaned daily including Christmas day and New year's day! The beds were comfortable and the TV and fridge inside the room gave us everything we needed. Will definitely stay there again when we return to Athens!

title: Nice food and excellent karaoke
text: The old brass rail has very friendly staff and nice food at affordable prices. However,for me, it was Dry the karaoke host that made all my visits there memorable. He was super friendly with a great sense of humour and most importantly a great karaoke host!

title: A wonderful resort
text: The resort is nicely located and both Phoenix and Scottsdale can be reached. The resort has many things to do especially if you have children. Some of the staff members were more experienced than others and as such were better able to answer my questions and assist me with my needs!

title: Great buffet
text: The selection at the restaurant was amazing. The oysters, scallops, sushi and coconut shrimp really stood out for me. The lunch menu doesn't have such a wide variety but it's still excellent none the less and very, very affordable. Highly recommend!!!

title: Great place, friendly people
text: The guys at Stacy's make you feel at home and the karaoke host Pablo never forgets your turn when it's time to sing! Very friendly atmosphere!!

title: A great place to eat
text: The cook shop has a great selection of dishes which are very well presented. The service is very friendly and the food tastes great!

title: Great place to eat with a lot of variety
text:
We kept eating here and loved it every time. We ate Orange Chicken with rice, Vegetable Chow Mein and Beef Teriyaki with rice with a bottle of water for under 13 Euro.

Some things on the menu seem expensive compared to what we ate but most of the prices were logical. The food was cooked on the spot and tasted amazing!

Will definitely eat there again. There was also a lot of variety to choose from!

title: Great place
text: We liked going to Victory Park and looking at Mother Armenia standing firm with her stern look and sword ready to protect Armenia. There are tanks, rockets and other military aeroplanes here!
place: Victory Park and Statue of Mother Armenia

title: Must see in Yerevan
text: The dancing fountains are a must see attraction in Yerevan. At night the fountains change colour and move to the rhythm of the music.

title: A great square
text: Republic Square is in centre of Yerevan and an easy landmark to find. At night there is a wonderful water show with music playing!

title: A nice place to visit
text: We learned a lot about Armenia's history by coming here! Very well maintained and we found out about the genocide that happened!

title: A great place near many tourist attractions
text: The room my father and I stayed in was comfortable. It wasn't big but we knew that when we made the booking. It was clean and had everything we wanted for the 5 nights we were there. The staff were super friendly and helped us with everything we wanted. Will definitely stay there again! The rooms are only cleaned every 4 nights!

title: A wonderful place to eat with the family
text: Ocean basket is very family friendly restaurant. Their menu is extensive and includes many options from fish, seafood and sushi. They always have fantastic promotions and they treat their customers well. Don't forget to ask for a VIP card which allows you to have a free platter for one after your sixth visit provided you spend 20 Euro or more each time!

title: A nice bridge
text: The bridge is nice but nothing really makes it stand out. However, if you want to take some good photos then it's fine! The views from the bridge are great!

title: A great historical site
text: If you like history then this is the place to visit. A wonderful place to walk around in and take some pictures!

title: A nice old temple!
text: The temple was in the city centre and easy to get to on foot from where we were staying. Loved taking pictures there!

title: A great hotel.
text: The hotel was wonderful and the staff were friendly and helpful. There were occasional problems between us and the hotel staff and some mistakes were made. The hotel's restaurant had a good range of food and drinks. The complimentary shuttle service to downtown Madrid was really good!

title: A great place with great staff close to many attractions.
text: The hotel was close to the city centre and around enough restaurants and attractions to make the stay one we will remember for a long time. The staff were very professional and helpful, especially Pedro whose English was good. The shower was a deluxe shower and there was hot water any time we needed it. We will definitely stay again when we return to Merida!

title: Great propert close to MGM
text: The Carriage house is about a 7 minute walk to the Las Vegas strip. The staff are very friendly and daily housekeeping was an added bonus. The hotel's pool and fitness room were great. Pam at concierge gave great tips about where to go and what to see!

title: A great place with friendly staff!!
text: A great place with friendly staff! Everyone went out of their way to make you feel welcome. The resort isn't far from downtown Phoenix. Jane the activities coordinator is really friendly and exceptionally good at her job!!
